name: Magikarp

attacks.name: Rapid Evolution
attacks.text: Search your deck for an Evolution card named Gyarados or Dark Gyarados and put it on Magikarp. (This counts as evolving Magikarp.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

flavorText: Recent research has revealed the presence of dragon DNA in this species of Pok√©mon.

strengths: Rapid Evolution allows turn-1 evolution to Gyarados/Dark Gyarados
Can search for either Gyarados variant

competitiveHistory: This Team Rocket Magikarp was notable for Rapid Evolution, which allowed you to evolve into Gyarados or Dark Gyarados immediately - even on the first turn or the turn Magikarp was played. This bypassed normal evolution rules and made Gyarados decks faster.

rulings.ruling: Rapid Evolution counts as evolving and can be used on the turn Magikarp is played or your first turn.
You can search for either Gyarados (Base Set) or Dark Gyarados.
Since this counts as evolving, Pokemon Powers that trigger 'when evolved' will activate.
